channel.title: MASHED - a 6-part therapeutic actual play
channel.description:
You may not already be aware of [DegeTime](https://www.degetime.com), but they're a band of gamers focused on mental wellness - and I'm pleased to say that they're currently doing a 6-part actual play series of my MASHED RPG over on YouTube! The first two parts are up now, and you can check them out [HERE](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-UKzUrQXbrI&t=9s).
I'm looking forward to seeing how this turns out and what thoughts they end up with.
